title: Improve UX on old products
description: Find a successful product that has terrible UX; improve the UX and re-sell to frustrated customers

title: Small but better
description: Find a large business and do a small part better

title: Counter intuitive ideas
description: Focus on solving problems through psychology (wit, advertising, power of influence) instead of technology or capital

title: Whitelable and re-sell
description: Resell a whitelabelled product in a proven market

title: Gift a share
description: A platform for Guardians (parents, godparents, uncles, aunts) to gift shares to Children (sons, daughters, nephews, nieces, godchildren)
